tic_tac_toe.title: Your Turn: Phonics
tic_tac_toe.directions: Match each word to the sentence it completes. If you are correct, place your X on the board by clicking a square. Three spaces in a row wins.

item.text: She made a(n) [adjustment] on the clock when daylight savings ended.
The [nomadic] group moved from place to place each season.
The [chattering] of a group of playing children is a happy sound.
The old [sturdy] chair has always been part of the school office.
We are careful never to leave a burning [ember] in the fireplace.
I am happy to have good [rapport] with my best friend’s parents.
The older boy next door is a [mentor] to my little brother.
Each summer our entire family [reunites] for a picnic at the beach.
I changed my [perspective] once I cooked dinners for a week.
After many hours of practice, I am more [adept] at playing the guitar.
The [windswept] seashore is quite beautiful in the winter.
I am proud that I triumphed after playing my most [formidable] opponent!
The judge ruled that the customer’s complaint was [legitimate].
After the [melancholy] movie, we went out for ice cream and felt better.
The teacher read the [preface] to the story to the whole class.
I can’t wait to [redeem] the stamps for a gift!
It’s not polite to [interfere] in other people’s conversations.
I studied the [abstract] ideas because they were so interesting.
People once thought a specific [formula]could turn any metal into gold.
